metadata.subject: Mathematics
metadata.curriculumTopic: Number and Algebra, Measurement and Geometry, Statistics and Probability
metadata.curriculumSubtopic: Number patterns, linear equations, scientific notation, Pythagoras theorem, trigonometry, bivariate data

questions.question: Find the length of the hypotenuse of a right triangle with legs of 3 cm and 4 cm.
questions.explanation: Using Pythagoras theorem: c² = a² + b². So c² = 3² + 4² = 9 + 16 = 25. Therefore c = √25 = 5 cm.
